name: Time Dilation
description:
Time Dilation

(And yes I there is a typo in the title screen)

Controls / tutorial You are the keeper of the clock of time and space. You job is to keep the time going. If the clock stops, time stops, you loose and the universe will be dead forever. If the key is in the green keyhole, go to it and with E you can rewind the clock. Some enemies will try and steal the key and some will try and kill you. If an enemy steals the key, kill it and bring the key to the green keyhole and rewind the clock.

WASD = Move

E =  wind clock

Mouse 1 = shoot

R = restart (Broken if you are dead, which defeats its purpose)

esc = Quit game (will just result in a black screen)

This was my first solo gamejam and second jam overall. Some stuff was left missing like the feature that was supposed to name the game... You'll have to wind and REWIND the clock again and again, till' you lose, good luck.

some missing features:

  •  time slowing down as the clock ticks down.
  •  timer/ score
  • options menu
  •  game end screen
  • some art
  •  many polishing touches

I sometimes make YouTube videos. Link to my channel.
